tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Into the Breach
programme.desc: Harm and Mac agree to help guide young student "attorneys" at Iron Forge Naval Academy, a prep school for the US Naval Academy, as they conduct a mock trial.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Boomerang (Part 2)
programme.desc: Hostilities between Harm and Brumby escalate both in and out of the courtroom and it takes Chegwidden, with Brumby's CO's approval to get them to deal with their anger.(n)

programme.title: JAG: People V. Gunny
programme.desc: Gunny is charged with gay-bashing following an off duty altercation outside a gay bar.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.sub-title: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.desc: Harm and Mac board a plane bound for Korea to investigate charges that GI's shot and killed civilians during the Korean War.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Mac is prosecuting a SEAL jumpmaster charged with causing the death of one of his men during a parachute insertion exercise.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Real Deal Seal
programme.desc: Medal of Honor Navy SEAL Lt. Curtis Rivers is court-martialed for punching a Congressional candidate who claims to be a Navy SEAL.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dumbster Fire
programme.desc: The geniuses of Team Scorpion turn into knuckleheads and Paige must simplify the science for them, when their mental faculties are impaired during a job to prevent the creation of a black hole.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dork Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Team Scorpion inadvertently crashes a bank robbery in progress and is taken hostage. Also, Sylvester's feelings for Florence grow.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Gator Done
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to the bayou to track down a cagey alligator in order to stop a deadly mosquito-borne virus, and Paige teaches Walter the concept of the 'white lie.'.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Foul Balls
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must use their high IQs to win a softball game when the homeland director challenges, with all of their future government contracts on the line.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Kenny and the Jet
programme.desc: Paige's maternal side goes into high gear when Team Scorpion must save an unconscious, a hypothermic boy stuck in the wheel well of their airborne airplane.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: A Lie in the Sand
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Northeast Africa where they must carefully navigate a minefield in order to save the lives of local villagers.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that’s a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris’s erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Two Truths and a Lie
programme.desc: As the officers of 15 Division try to hunt down the killer of Brian Gowdy – Andy and Sam go on the road to interview a list of inmates at Millburn Penitentiary.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deal with the Devil
programme.desc: In the midst of a chaotic day at the station, Oliver prepares Andy to defend herself at Duncan’s dismissal hearing, now happening two hours from now.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Chris’s addiction issues come to a head when an innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a suspicious home invasion investigation.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: "Moving Day"
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, “Moving Day”, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that’s being torn down.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Old Nick Theatre
programme.desc: Once a prison and a police station and now a theatre the Old Nick is famous for its unexplained occurrences. Fred decides to summon up some extra help while objects move and something wants to make itself known.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Thackray Museum
programme.desc: The medical museum houses a great many objects from its distant hospital and workhouse past with a complete Victorian street scene on the lower level.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Village Church Farm
programme.desc: A museum like no other, this small collection of antiquated buildings is said to be the home of several spirits. The team get more than they bargained for as objects move; strange noises are caught on camera and the best EVP response to date.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team take on their largest investigation to date. They have been invited to investigate a large estate where it seems just about every building has a ghostly tale.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Star Island
programme.desc: The TAPS team braves the wintery waters of the Atlantic to investigate Star Island off of the coast of Portsmouth, NH.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Fright At The Opera
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the team anticipates the possibility of encountering a demonic entity at the Burlingame & Chaffee Opera House, in Carthage, Missouri.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 3
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: 1st Edition Apparition
programme.desc: TAPS is revisiting Edith Wharton's home, The Mount, in Lenox, Massachusetts. It's believed Edith andher husband could be behind increased activity since the team's last investigation in 2008.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.sub-title: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.desc: A hostage situation ensues when the crew confronts Tyr.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Conduit to Destiny
programme.desc: A wrong turn in the slipstream leads Andromeda to a prison riot.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Machinery of the Mind
programme.desc: The Andromeda crew steps up to find out who killed a group of scientists.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Exalted Reason, Resplendent Daughter
programme.desc: The crew is hired to rescue a princess from a notorious outlaw, but it is soon revealed that she was trying to escape murder at her father's hand.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Torment, the Release
programme.desc: The Collectors now control the Commonwealth and put the Andromeda crew on trial.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.65
programme.desc: Man allegedly damages SUV during child custody exchange, claims admission under duress. Teenager sued by older sister for scooter balance; teen claims vehicle given in exchange for care of grandmother.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.141
programme.desc:
Alleged assaults and vicious scratching, rumors about injuring a			
child, and unpaid bills divide ex-lovers.			
Paternity tests and trailer storage come into play when a woman			
sues her daughter’s former friend for 13 months worth of rent.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.181
programme.desc: Two 18-year-old girls accused of spray painting each other’s cars trace their alleged vandalism back to high school issues. A 'tickling' incident between young lovers causes a shoulder injury and a dispute over treatment costs.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.83
programme.desc: Judge Judy bets a year’s salary that a young man didn’t declare certain earnings on his tax return. He is sued by an ex-lover for loans, a hotel room, and a digital camera.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.54
programme.desc: Man sues mother of his child for totaled 1999 Nissan Ultima value and pawn retrieval costs; she claims car ownership/Former best friends dispute unpaid rent, bills for shared townhouse amid single motherhood and break-up.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.124
programme.desc: Man alleges vandalism and gang assault at family party/Man blames ex-girlfriend for inability to repay $9,000 car loan due to cheating and abandonment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.88
programme.desc: An alleged loan to pay off a sports gambling debt is disputed by ex- friends who disagree about whether or not they dated/A woman is suing her former friend for an alleged loan to catch-up on his delinquent truck payments.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.153
programme.desc: An incident of road rage escalates when a woman blows a kiss and laughs as she crosses the path of an angry, frustrated driver.\t\t\t\r\nClaiming she was kicked out illegally, a woman refuses to pay for rent and living expenses.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.34
programme.desc: Mother falsely accused of child abuse by ex-husband, his mother, and roommate/Case dismissed after 17 abuse reports/Man sues great nephew for jeep damage; nephew claims fun spin caused crash.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.250
programme.desc: A teenager's friend faces accusations of drinking, driving, and crashing a stolen golf cart; he blames the teenager's mother for providing alcohol. Two brothers fight over damages to a home allegedly caused by domestic violence.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.180
programme.desc: A 66-year-old analyst for the U.S. Department of Defense claims he\t\t\t\r\nwas intimate with a 27-year-old sports bar worker and that she owes\t\t\t\r\nhim money. She denies his claims.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The four chefs must teach bachelors with no cooking experience how to prepare monkfish, the winner and a chosen guest get to ride on a Goodyear blimp.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the chefs' ability to identify flavours and ingredients by asking them to re-create one of his specialties, but a contestant becomes overwhelmed.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final two contestants get a preview of the executive chef experience and are presented with a nerve-wracking challenge. The winner is announced.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: In this opening instalment of the US cookery competition, Chef Ramsay splits the contestants into teams before asking each person to prepare their signature dish.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining 14 chefs battle in the competition.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Preparing breakfast for 50 paramedics is the challenge facing the contestants, with the first group to complete service winning.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Beating the System
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey learn their surrogate is pregnant, both of their lives change. Meanwhile, Timmy takes on the responsibility of wedding planner for Adam and Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Jeff Photo
programme.desc: When an old photo of Jeff appears in an art gallery, he decides it's time to make some changes in his life. Meanwhile, Russell experiences a slump with women until he sees a familiar face.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Power Couple
programme.desc: Jeff is threatened when Audrey gets a raise and makes almost as much as he does. Meanwhile, Russell enlists Timmy to find out what Liz sees in another man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Double Down
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt, as suggested by Adam. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy’s help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.desc: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with 'red hot' ladies but instead, it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Jeff and Audrey settle an argument.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk
programme.desc: Russell tries to get out of his marriage to an overly enthused Liz, who tries to make it work, while Jeff attempts to engage Audrey in dirty talk.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey Is Dumb
programme.desc: Jeff celebrates Audrey's inability to talk after her node removal surgery. Russell gets Timmy to fire an employee for him, and Adam discovers he's only getting free stuff because of his good looks.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trouble in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog is back in Hawaii and tracking a dangerous fugitive through the jungles of the Big Island. Their prey is being protected by a ring of family and friends that Dog must forcefully confront to bring in his man.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Power
programme.desc: When Dog decides to spend the day caring for his newest granddaughter, Beth enlists the girls to hunt down a female fugitive. Heading into a dangerous part of town the ladies will use their feminine wiles to track this mother gone wrong.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Ties
programme.desc: Dog doesn't have the whole team today and he's got to catch a fugitive with a record of criminal assault. But when Dog finds the fugitive's former girlfriend, she thinks he isn't dangerous at all.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Special Delivery
programme.desc: For months, this fugitive has been stringing Leland along with a series of barely believable excuses. Out of patience, Leland calls in the Big Dog. The whole team heads out to put pressure on the family and friends of the fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surface Scratches
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Great Debate
programme.desc: When the co-signer of a bond is also romantically involved with the defendant, sometimes the bondman is put in the middle of a lover's quarrel.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Facebooked
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But unfortunately they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mano-a-Mano
programme.desc: Back in Colorado, Dog's on the hunt for a runner with more than a decade's worth of trouble with the law. But the fugitive's friends and family are reluctant to help Dog bring him in.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drive-In Revivin'
programme.desc: Korie challenges Willie to come up with a romantic gesture without spending any money. Missy and Jase compete to see who can find a girlfriend for Mountain Man.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fishful Thinking
programme.desc: Jase's hopes to win the inaugural Duck Commander Fishing Tournament is buoyed when he is able to enlist the help of legendary angler Bill Dance. Meanwhile, Willie's vanity over his greying beard leads him to make a questionable decision.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: Native
programme.desc: Two scientists are selected to travel across the universe to the source of a distant transmission and potential life.(n)

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: In 2050, 86-year-old Marjorie has a holographic companion who resembles her dead husband and is programmed to feed her the story of her life. With Lois Smith, Jon Hamm, Geena Davis.(n)

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: Radio astronomer Zane Zaminsky believes he has picked up a cosmic noise that signals extraterrestrial intelligence. His desperate search for answers leads him to discover that aliens are already on Earth and in the process of preparing to take it over.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: A dramatization of the April 2010 disaster, when an oil well called Deepwater Horizon exploded causing the worst spill in US history.(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.(n)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a call-girl-turned-actress and works to help her advance her career, but things get a little more complicated than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A scientist becomes obsessed with bringing back his family members who died in a traffic accident.(n)

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: A team of scientists are gathered to prevent a global catastrophe. But one of the scientists realizes early on that the cause of volcanic reactions is most likely due to a secret government operation investigating alternative energy resources.(n)

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.(n)

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: 48 Christmas Wishes
programme.desc: After losing an entire town's letters to Santa, two junior Elves leave the North Pole and attempt to blend into small town life as they set out to retrieve every missing wish before Santa's sleigh departs on Christmas Eve.(n)

programme.title: K9 Christmas: Scoot & Kassie's Christmas Adventure
programme.desc: Kassie rescues Scoot, a former K-9 police dog, who becomes her best friend. But when two men turn up to work at the bank that Kassie's dad (Luke Perry) manages she finds out they are crooks with plans to get their hands on all the money and ruin Christmas.(n)

programme.title: I'll Be Next Door For Christmas
programme.desc: When 16-year-old Nicky’s long-distance boyfriend decides to visit for the holidays, she’s determined to spare him her family’s over-the-top Christmas obsession, by staging a fake Christmas dinner in the empty house next door...(n)

programme.title: The Bachelor Next Door
programme.desc: A newly engaged couple becomes intrigued by the young stranger who moves in next door. He's handsome, friendly and very helpful, but he's no stranger.(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Loves Music, Love To Dance
programme.desc: The personal ads of New York's trendiest magazines become the hunting ground for a bizarre killer whose calling card is a single, high heeled dancing shoe and one woman is determined to find out his true identity after the murder of her friend.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of the Wilderness Family
programme.desc: A Los Angeles construction worker (Robert F. Logan) moves his wife (Susan Damante Shaw), son and asthmatic daughter (Hollye Holmes) to the Rockies.(n)

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: A heroic squire (Stephen Moyer) protects a princess (Katherine Heigl) and tries to retrieve the sword Excalibur from Viking raiders.(n)

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: On Luce Price's first day at the Sword & Cross boarding school, her attention is captured by the strangely familiar Daniel Grigori. She soon discovers he is a fallen angel who has battled over her for centuries.(n)

programme.title: Drive Angry
programme.desc: A brutal felon escapes from hell and, with police and a satanic henchman on his trail, sets out to avenge his daughter's murder and save his grandchild from bloodthirsty cultists.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Magic Beyond Words
programme.desc: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings, as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager, to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.(n)

programme.title: Windstorm
programme.desc: Rebel teen Mika encounters a beautiful, wild stallion named Windstorm at her grandmother's riding school and learns she can communicate with horses.(n)

programme.title: A Dog Named Duke
programme.desc: When a former soldier finds himself homeless, he decides the best thing to do for his sick dog (Duke) is to leave him on the steps of a local animal shelter. The dedicated staff nurse Duke back to health and then launch a campaign to locate his owner...(n)

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George is a retired soccer pro whose glory days are behind him. Burnt out on his playboy lifestyle and bankrupted by a string of bad investments, he moves back to Virginia to reconnect with his estranged ex-wife and neglected son.(n)

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with her small-town misery after she discovers a roller derby league in nearby Austin.(n)

programme.title: Checkpoint
programme.desc: The agent of an auto industrialist is sent to Italy to lure an Italian designer away from his firm. However, the plan goes wrong and leads to theft, corruption and even murder.(n)

programme.title: Don't Ever Leave Me
programme.desc: Jack's grandfather Harry comes out of prison and stays with him in his mews flat.(n)

programme.title: The Frightened City
programme.desc: A small time thief is recruited by a mobster to help with the racketeering. He doesn't like the job, but with the mob on his back, a femme fatale in his bed and a sick friend to care for, he will have to keep all his wits about him.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: The Leap Home, Pt. II - April 7, 1970
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of an American soldier in Vietnam whose field officer is Tom Beckett (David Newsom) -Sam's brother.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) is a priest in 1963 whose fellow pastor (Sandy McPeak) finds his own life in jeopardy because he knows a killer's identity. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: One Strobe Over the Line - June 15, 1965
programme.desc: In 1963, Sam (Scott Bakula) is a fashion photographer trying to prevent a model's overbearing agent (Susan Anton) from pushing her over the brink. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) is brought back to Halloween 1964 as a horror novelist who has his own share of scary experiences, including an encounter with the devil. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a woman -- a young competitor in the 1958 Miss Deep South beauty pageant. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Afterlife and Death
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are in Cairo, Egypt and then Amsterdam. They must beat rival relic hunter Avery Ko to the Pharaoh Thutmose's diamond before it is cut up and sold.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Etched in Stone
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Stewie Harper head to Stockholm, Sweden to find the Runestone of King Jann I of Norway.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Irish Crown Affair
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Dublin, Ireland in search of the missing crown of the last King of Ireland.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: A Vanishing Art
programme.desc: Accompanying Max the magician, Sydney and Nigel journey to Atlantic City, New Jersey in search of Hungary's lost and allegedly cursed Royal Scepter.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Love Letter
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to France to look for the lost wedding vows of Josephine Pontoise and Guy de Bourdin, which would prove their heir is the rightful owner of St. Agnes Sur-Loire.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Top Gun Ton
programme.desc: Scale RC Viper FanJet aircraft with a potent jet engine; 1920s Gundlach Korona large format field camera used for photography expeditions. Ton pilots a plane, but crashes and burns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Ton and Allen duke it out with a local thrift store gang at a Brooklyn storage auction. The guys discover a classic arcade redemption game and a mid-century water cannon designed to fight towering infernos!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Labor of Love
programme.desc: Harley Davidson V-twin EVO engine and revolutionary 1958 dual-suspension swingarm frame; '80s Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine; rare Air Jordan vintage shoe collection in mint condition.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Miami Heat
programme.desc: All-terrain Air Commander Hovercraft, a 1970s NASA countdown clock and a one-of-a-kind 1960s Delta Relay rocket.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hidden Hot Wheels
programme.desc: Ton and Allen challenge a big time auction buyer on his home turf. The guys uncover a 1969 Chevelle Malibu muscle car and a single-shot pistol designed to aid Allied resistance fighters during WWII.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Hot Commodity
programme.desc: Allen is late to the auction, leaving Ton to battle a feisty female auction buyer on his own! The guys find a fully functional flamethrower and a rare hand-carved bow and arrow set from South America!(n)
